name: Minor TV Characters Trivia Game | Mixture: Classics | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
'Hogan's Heroes'.

	Ivan Dixon was the African-American prisoner who operated the radio. Later, that role was played by Kenneth Washington.

'Star Trek'.

	She played Yeoman Janice Rand in the early episodes.

'Superman'.

	Hamilton was Perry White. Shayne was Inspector Henderson.

'Mannix'.

	Wood played Police Lieutenant Art Malcolm. (Robert Reed also played a comparable role in the series at a different time.)

'McHale's Navy'.

	Hastings played the bumbling, wimpy, Elroy Carpenter.

'Rockford Files'.

	Corbett played Rockford's lawyer and girl friend, Beth Davenport.

'Perry Mason'.

	Collins was Lt. Tragg. Hopper was investigator Paul Drake.

'Mission: Impossible'.

	Hill was Mr. Briggs before being replaced by Peter Graves (as Mr. Phelps.)

'My Favorite Martian'.

	She played the neighbor, Mrs.Brown.
